column5: BCLI the article just makes me sad that RTT did not help others The backlash Brainstorm received was was unwarranted and cost many lives The treatment will be expensive until scale allows ways to reduce costs Its bullshit Pals not getting treatment somehow

BCLI the company has done an amazing job of putting pieces in place amd now FDA needs to recognize June 12th I hope Brainstorm attends and supports Pals in this meeting They need a way to get NurOwn now not later

BCLI BIO 2019 should be a pivotal point for stock Much has been accomplished but not recognized Updates on all fronts of the business like commercialization and investor partnership updates have been quiet This would be a great time and place to provide clear timelines for JV or licensing deal Stock has been broken and needs to be addressed with positive news
BCLI has 2 buy ratings 0 sell ratings and 0 hold ratings blueequityiosymbolBCLIR
BCLI Im going to stick my neck out and predict we have seen the low for share pricewill never be this low againever
